column1: 2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
:A Decipher card identifies one of the Gondorians of Minas Tirith in The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King as Derufin.
2015: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:Derufin and Duilin (son of Duinhir) were hunting enthusiasts. Bored waiting for battle
column2: they sneaked across the river to Ithilien to hunt. They could be found in Bar Húrin. In The Strength of Sauron the player accompanied them as they attempted to hunt Oliphaunts. They encountered more than one mûmak and
column4: were quickly forced to flee. However the brothers noted the beasts eyes as vulnerable targets
column5: and despite the failure they agreed to help the player search Osgiliath for Faramir in exchange for the assistance. The brothers accompanied the player into the city
column6: and the group succeeded in damaging Grond (battering ram) before encountering Gothmog (Lieutenant of Morgul) and being forced to retreat.
